In the Season 5 premiere, writer Jenny Scott follows in the footsteps of "To Kill a Mockingbird" author Harper Lee when she travels to Alabama, but things take a scary turn.
Three young college students recall moving into a rental property in a rundown Savannah neighborhood and coming face-to-face with the ghost of a demented crack fiend.
Life turns hellish for three young girls from a Hispanic family after they break the rules when playing with a Ouija board.

In this account, a loving Christian family are shocked to discover that their eldest son has entered into a deadly contract with the devil, which is why a mysterious and evil "Tall Man" is stalking their home.
A war veteran takes a new job in Lawton, Okla., but the fresh start that he and his brothers decide to make together turns nightmarish when a malignant demon known as the Zozo enters the picture.
A young couple discuss their alleged encounter with the terrifying Mothman, which they claim to have unwittingly awakened during a sightseeing trip in Point Pleasant, N.J.
A family claim that American serial killer Stephen Richards, who was executed by hanging in Nebraska in 1879, is terrorizing their home.
A woman begins to wonder what secrets lie buried beneath her newly purchased home in the town of Santa Susana Knolls, Cal., which has a reputation for its troubled past with biker gangs and violence.

A family's dream ranch in rural Texas soon turns into a nightmare upon their discovering the property's horrifying history. Also: There's a reported encounter with wolf-like creatures that seem to want the new homeowners to go away.

A prison guard fears for his safety working the night shift at Estrella Jail in Phoenix, where legend has it that the spirit of a violent criminal is responsible for driving inmates and officers crazy, and even to their deaths.
In the Season 4 premiere, the owners of an abandoned motel are pushed to the brink of evil.
Three female college students claim that they are being terrorized by a demon woman hell-bent on tearing their lives apart.
A Pennsylvania politician finds himself doing battle with the ghost of a murderous doctor that haunts his home, and also an ancient pagan god that the doctor once worshipped.
A family claim they are being torn apart by a life-size doll, which they fear is possessed and after their 6-year-old daughter's soul.
A woman who is consumed by guilt over her grandfather's death believes he is haunting her and her family.
A family are fearful of what they describe as a darkness that lurks beneath the inky water of a pond at the back of their property.
A family's dream "forever" home turns into a nightmare when they discover satanic symbols carved into the floorboards and start to believe that a dark, terrifying demon is after one of their souls.

A stroke victim and her family seek a fresh start in a new country home, but instead end up fighting for their lives and sanity when they encounter what they believe to be a band of terrifying Native American spirits.
A woman suspects that something evil is hiding behind a boarded-up fireplace in her apartment in Washington, Mo., which she once thought of as a sanctuary, but now fears is haunted by a witch.
The parents of five girls claim that malevolent forces terrorized them physically and even put a life-threatening curse on the family, which resulted in a near-fatal incident.
Season 3 begins with the story of a firefighter's widow who feared for the safety of her daughters after unknowingly purchasing a home that once belonged to devil worshipers.
A couple with no children feel like they are being haunted by the son they never had.
Three brothers share their experience of reuniting on a family farm and the disturbing memories they each encountered from their childhood.
The owners of a restaurant in El Paso are convinced that during renovations to the place they inadvertently opened a portal to the spirit world.
A devout Baptist family from Indiana's alleged battle with demonic forces is recalled.
Medical professionals from different hospitals in the U.S. reveal their alleged encounters with ghosts.
The story of a Hollywood private investigator who built a home near Sharon Tate's former residence and claims that he's haunted by the victims of those murdered by Charles Manson and his followers.
Stories of an alleged Freddy Krueger-like entity living in the Appalachian hills.
Five werewolves hold a family hostage in their own home.
An innocent man is haunted by the face of the saint of the criminal underworld.
A parapsychologist investigates a young mother's California bungalow in the Season 2 premiere.
A family's scary experiences in a Brooklyn townhouse are detailed.
Recounting strange phenomena at Salt Lake City's Capitol Theatre.
The origins of a Dybbuk Box, which is said to contain a malevolent spirit, is investigated by its owner after it supposedly created havoc in the lives of two previous owners.
The ghost of a Victorian-era mother may be haunting the home of newlyweds.

"The Apartment," 9/12/12: When the paranormal activity in her new apartment ramps up, a single mom goes on a journey to discover the identity of the spirit who might be haunting her and stumbles upon a horrifying possibility.
A family learn that their new Connecticut home was once a funeral parlor, and soon strange incidents occur within its walls.
A family fears their Indianapolis mansion is haunted by the serial killer who previously resided there.
The story of an alleged alien abduction is told by the people who were involved.
A creature with 14-in. feet is tracked to a cabin in the woods of London, Ohio; and in North Carolina, a man claims to see an apparition of a red-haired girl running across his backyard.
A family is confronted by a vicious poltergeist in their new California home; a former deputy sheriff's encounter with a mysterious beast in the wilderness of Oregon is detailed.
"The Haunting Of Mansifield Mansion", 9/28/11: One woman's dream house becomes a nightmare when she discovers it was once used as a horrific asylum.
A night of UFO sightings in Trumbull County, Ohio, is documented on police radio recordings; a malevolent spirit summoned via a Ouija board terrorizes a young family.
A demonic possession tale involving a convict who was released to attend his grandfather's funeral; a haunted plantation home in North Carolina is discussed.
The 2 hour premiere.
An insight into some prominent artworks throughout history, as they may reveal an extraterrestrial influence.

In the 21st century, scholars, scientists, and governments have openly joined the hunt for intelligent life beyond Earth. In reality, this has been underway for decades, starting around 1947. Astronaut theorists suggest similar endeavors were even made thousands of years ago, sighting ancient astronomical observatories found all over the world, and new evidence that Babylonians were tracking the movements of the planets over 2,000 years ago.

A study of artificial metallic objects dating back hundreds of thousands of years, including mysterious metal spheres that defy the laws of physics, an ancient aluminum wedge that has left historians baffled, and a strange metallic sphere that fell from the sky and grabbed the attention of the U.S. Navy.
An exploration of the possibility that files related to the history of UFO phenomenon are locked up in a manor house in the Wiltshire, England, countryside.

A study of similar architectural marvels of the ancient world that bear striking similarities to one another, among them the pyramid complex in Giza, Egypt, the Avenue of the Dead pyramids in Mexico, an ancient pyramid temple in Cambodia known as Baksei Chamkrong.
A study of the curse placed upon the tomb of King Tutankhamun.
A study of scientific discoveries, artifacts and evidence that could point to extraterrestrial origins, but that the academic community denies.
The ancient Aztec site of Teotihuacan in central Mexico is explored as the possible remnants of a highly advanced, perhaps extraterrestrial, civilization.
A look at the possibility that mantras and chanting connect one to a higher plane and that certain frequencies provide links to greater, extraterrestrial forces.

The study of a top-secret group within the U.S. government called "The Majestic Twelve," scientists, government officials and military elite investigating reports of unidentified flying objects and supposedly examining crashed extraterrestrial craft.
A look at brainwaves during deep meditation to observe the physical changes in the brain during a phenonmena known as Akashic records.
Season 10 opens with a study of possible pyramids in Antarctica.
A look at the possibility of extraterrestrials on Mars.
A look at the possibility that superhuman beings once walked Earth and set the stage for mankind's future technological advances.
Theorists ponder recent evidence of past extraterrestrial intervention on Earth.

Scientists theorize that mankind will communicate with extraterrestrials through mathematics and binary code, creating the possibility that extraterrestrials have been communicating with mathematicians and engineers to bring about the space age and computers. Ancient astronaut theorists agree, and as evidence, they point to the true father of the space program, Nikolai Fyodorov, a Cosmist who believed that human civilization had its origins in outer space.
A show that explores into the formation of myths of diverse principles.
A look at the indigenous legends of the Aborigines of Australia that purport to describe how life began and that the planet was seeded by extraterrestrials.
An investigation into the theory that nine godlike extraterrestrials have influenced events on Earth.
An examination of possible extraterrestrial visitation in China.
Archeological discoveries prove that life on Earth in the past was very different.
In the Season 9 premiere, large man-made caves, mysterious structures and unusual underwater discoveries from ancient times are examined.
A look at the possibility that Wernher von Braun had extraterrestrial assistance with his aerospace creations.
A look at the link between aliens and robots.
A look at purported dark forces.
Different theories that relate certain myths and legends to extraterrestrial life are discussed.
A look at the search for other planets capable of sustaining life.
A living sea plankton is discovered by Russian cosmonauts in the International Space station sparking discussion about extraterrestrial life.
Crop circles are investigated.
An investigation into whether the U.S. has a secret space program that could be preparing for war with other nations or other species.
A look at forbidden sites that house ancient artifacts, relics, sacred texts and irreplaceable records.
Prehistoric artwork found in India is examined in the Season 8 premiere.
A theory linking the Great Sphinx in Giza, Egypt, to aliens is examined.
A theory linking human technology to aliens is examined.
A theory linking human genius to extraterrestrials.
Examining the practice of mummification and a potential link to extraterrestrials.

Cryptic communications found in religious texts and ancient monuments are examined.
Examining ancient stories of a worldwide flood and a possible link to aliens.
An examination into the possible impact of extraterrestrial beings on the Civil War.
A study of extraterrestrial impact on pyramids in Egypt, Peru, Central America and Indonesia.
Ancient reports of UFOs are examined.
Examining a theory that aliens helped ancient humans construct megalithic structures.
A potential link between alien technology and mysterious devices from ancient cultures is examined.
Examining a theory that extraterrestrials visited with ancient humans.

Examining a theory that inventor Nikola Tesla communicated with extraterrestrials.
Examining a theory about the origins of the universe.
Examining possible evidence of alien intervention throughout human history.
Examining a potential link between aliens and superheros.
Myths about celestial portals are examined.
Signs of alien contact throughout America's history are examined.
A theory about gifted children and a potential link to aliens is examined.
Examining a theory linking aliens to lost treasure around the world.
A theory about the existence of life on Mars is examined.
Exploring a theory that spiritual leaders have communicated with extraterrestrials throughout history.
A potential link between aliens and insects is examined.
Examining a theory that early humans mated with aliens.
Mythical theories about the number three are examined in the Season 6 premiere.
Examining mysteries surrounding crystal skulls that are believed to have supernatural powers.
A theory crediting advancements in human civilization to ancient gods is examined.
Examining ancient accounts of magic.
A theory that Satan was an extraterrestrial is examined.
Ancient medical procedures and their possible connection with aliens are explored.
Examining a theory that aliens helped ancient rulers rise to power.
Examining ancient relics that are thought to possess otherworldly powers.
A theory linking lost civilizations to aliens is examined.
Myths about the Ark of the Covenant are examined.
Examining a potential link between Earth's pyramids and otherworldly beings.
Examining alleged encounters with alien spacecrafts.
Examining a theory that ancient civilizations had access to lightbulbs and batteries.
Examining a potential link between the Orion constellation and alien visits to Earth.
Examining a theory that extraterrestrials were responsible for the intelligence of historical geniuses.
Examining a possible link between extraterrestrials and strange items and writings that have been found in ancient tombs around the world.
Exploring a theory that alleged prophets communicated with extraterrestrials throughout history.
Examining a potential link between aliens and large designs found in Peru's Nazca Desert.
Examining alleged alien abductions throughout history.
Examining author Erich von Däniken's controversial theories about alien life.
Season 4 opens with a Mayan-conspiracy theme. Included: the vanishing of the Mayan civilization; decoded scripts that document their advanced culture.
Exploring doomsday prophecies as related to the end of the Mayan calendar.
Exploring the "Greys," alleged alien beings with gray skin, enlarged heads and large eyes. Included: how the beings have been depicted in carved rock art through the ages.
The role of extraterrestrials in world catastrophes is explored.
Researchers probe NASA-related information in the search for proof of alien contact in the recent and ancient past.
The mysteries of the Puma Punku ruins in South America are explored. Investigators tap into forensic evidence and computer tests to study whether aliens may have inhabited this sophisticated complex.
A possible connection between Bigfoot and aliens is examined.
Leonardo da Vinci's paintings and sketches are examined in search of a possible connection to alien technology.
Scientists explore a theory that alien sightings may be evidence of time travelers from the future.
A theory that alien beings killed off the dinosaurs to allow the rise of humankind is explored in the fourth-season finale.

The third-season opener explores alien connections with the American West, including the claim that an alien was buried in a cemetery in Texas; Utah petroglyphs depicting unusual beings; and reports of strange creatures from 19th-century ranchers in California.
The theory that ancient stories about monsters may have been rooted in alien encounters is explored. Included: the flying creature Garuda in Hindu mythology; and the myth of Medusa.
Historic sacred places and possible alien connections are explored. Included: Jerusalem's Temple Mount; the Islamic shrine at Mecca; and the temple at Baalbek, Lebanon.
A possible link between gold and aliens is explored. Included: a theory regarding lost gold in Peru; and a legend regarding the Sphinx.
Ancient rites and rituals and their possible connection with aliens are explored.
Building tools and technology and the possibility that they were influenced by aliens are explored. Included: a mountaintop fortress in Peru; and temples at Vijayanagar, India.
A possible connection between aliens and plagues and epidemics is explored. Also: the possibility of microscopic aliens.
The connection between lost civilizations and aliens is explored. Included: carvings at the Mayan city of Copan; and the body adornments of the ancient Nazca people.
The theory that advances in weapons were influenced by aliens is explored.
Supposed evil places and their connection with aliens are explored. Included: Australia's Black Mountains; a forest near Mount Fuji in Japan.

The second-season opener examines mysterious places on Earth connected with UFO sightings, including the Bermuda Triangle; Mexico's Zone of Silence in the Chihuahuan desert; and Peru's Puerta de Hayu Marca.

The possibility that myths about gods could have been accounts of alien visitations and that they helped advance civilization are explored. Included: similar stories by cultures separated by great distances; and stories of gods offering technological advice.
A discussion of ancient underwater cities cited as evidence of alien visitations. Included: ancient Indian texts that describe what could be aliens in sunken cities.

Underground tunnels and caverns and what proof they offer of alien visitations are examined. Included: a cave in Ecuador with books that could reveal alien technology; an underground city in Turkey; and Native American legends of underground beings.
Exploring a theory that Nazis built experimental weapons and crafts based on information brought to Earth by aliens.
Evidence of alien technology on Earth is explored.
Examining the possibility that accounts of angels could actually be about extraterrestrials.

Mysterious structures whose purpose and method of creation are unexplained are explored. Included: the Gobekli Tepe archaeological site in Turkey, where stone structures forming perfect circles are thought to be 12,000 years old.
The theory that catastrophic events, both natural and man-made, may be the work of aliens controlling the Earth, is explored.
The theory that aliens passed on messages to humans in order to influence history and the arts is examined.

The legacy of aliens and speculation that alien technology inspired modern inventions are explored. Included: ancient Indian texts describing flying machines; and Egyptian megaliths that show evidence of precision saws.
Examining early evidence of aliens and the influence of the supposed visitors. Included: Hopi and Zuni costumes; Chinese legends that could be about a spacecraft.
The mission of aliens and evidence that may hold the clues are explored. Included: Sumerian tablets describing aliens who came to Earth to mine for gold; Egyptian hieroglyphs; and crop circles.

UFO sightings depicted in visual and written accounts are examined. Included: a 13th-century book describing a flying craft over Bristol, England; a log entry from Christopher Columbus' voyage to America recalling strange lights in the sky; and medieval art showing disk-like objects floating in the sky.
Stories of alien encounters in the 20th century are examined, including speculation on future contact and the protocol regarding forms of communication. Included: the famous Roswell incident.
